EmailTemplate.name: MyGDC registration request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for taking the time to register for MyGDC website access.
In order to complete your request we need some additional information. Is there a specific Honeywell account, aircraft tail number, or project that will require access to MyGDC.com?
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName}
Honeywell | Aerospace
GoDirect Services
email: fssaccounts@honeywell.com
Visit the MyAerospace Portal: https://myaerospace.honeywell.com
